data.eml:eml: A new species of amphipod, Megamphopus katagani sp. nov. (Crustacea: Peracarida: Photidae) from the Sea of Marmara (Turkey), with a key to the species of Megamphopus in the North Atlantic, Mediterranean and associated Seas

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Bakir, Kerem, Sezgin, Murat, Myers, Alan A. (2011): A new species of amphipod, Megamphopus katagani sp. nov. (Crustacea: Peracarida: Photidae) from the Sea of Marmara (Turkey), with a key to the species of Megamphopus in the North Atlantic, Mediterranean and associated Seas. Zootaxa 2791: 63-67, DOI: 10.5281/zenodo.207651
